name: Nika Katsitadze
story:
Hi, I’m a Frontend Engineer building and maintaining web apps, custom UI libraries and reusable components. 
 While I focus on frontend development with React, Svelte, JS/TS, and Next.js, I also contribute to the backend to understand the full system. 
 I prioritize creating smooth, accessible, and visually appealing interfaces. My work includes designing flexible UI components, optimizing applications, and improving development workflows. 
 I’m always learning whether refining best practices, exploring new tools, or staying updated on frontend trends to build intuitive and efficient user experiences.
